author: daniellehrner
content:

So the one that will be discussed in the next ACDE call. Or are there maybe future changes planned?

author: lightclient
content: i have a PR to make some refinements https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/8561

author: daniellehrner
content: I think that's the same file. Thank you!

author: lightclient
content: ah sorry! i just saw the `ethereum/EIPs` in the link and thought it was to what has already been merged

author: ryanleeschneider
content: Should the EIP set a sane limit on the number of tuples in the auth list or will that be mempool dependent? Also what about either repeats (either verbatim or pointing to different code for the same account?)

author: lightclient
content: I'm not sure if I have good enough understanding of the implications of a large auth list to limit it yet. My initial impression is that it should only be limited by block gas and p2p wire size.

author: lightclient
content: Repeats are a bit unclear, i can update so that it is noted explicitly
